content: published in *designs for crochet* royal society book 36 in 1934 recharted by christine anderson hook sizes are the ones listed for gauge with various threads only one hook is needed to complete **materials ** * crochet cotton #5 about 453 yds steel crochet hook us size 4 *or* * crochet cotton #10 about 403 yds steel crochet hook us size 7 *or* * crochet cotton #20 about 378 yds steel crochet hook us size 9 *or* * crochet cotton #30 about 354 yds steel crochet hook us size 11 **approximate finished sizes ** * using #5 14 4 inches x 21 6 inches 36 6 x 54 9 cm * using #10 12 0 inches x 17 0 inches 30 5 x 43 2 cm * using #20 11 4 inches x 16 3 inches 29 x 41 4 cm * using #30 10 9 inches x 15 6 inches 27 7 x 39 6 cm **gauge ** * using #5 10 squares = 2 8 inches 7 1 cm 10 row = 3 2 inches 8 1 cm * using #10 10 squares = 2 3 inches 5 8 cm 10 row = 2 5 inches 6 4 cm * using #20 10 squares = 2 2 inches 5 6 cm 10 row = 2 4 inches 6 1 cm * using #30 10 squares = 2 1 inches 5 3 cm 10 row = 2 3 inches 5 8 cm
